name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duefocus - time tracking app for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time tracking & productivity extension you’ll actually use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time tracking & productivity extension you’ll actually use.
 
Duefocus overview:
 
DueFocus is an all-in-one solution for teams to track their productivity & time — it’s easy-to-use, provides in-depth performance analytics and powerful enough to run your business.
 
What Makes DueFocus an Innovative Time Tracker:
-Multivariate tracking
-Real-time monitoring
-Stage mapping
-Easy reporting
-Embedded easy-to-use task tracker
-Idle detection
-Screenshotting
-Analyze time in reports
-Manage teams and track progress
 
1. Click "Add to Chrome".
2. Log in to Duefocus from the extension menu.
3. If you don't have an account, sign up for free on https://duefocus.com/
4. Start timer inside one of the supported web tools and the task’s name and project will be added to your Duefocus web app.
5. Make data-driven decisions for everyday efficiency growth with Duefocus extension.
 
If you have any issues or feedback write to us at support@diligences.com

Try it now!
